title: New Quarkiverse extension for Zenoh support in Quarkus

labels.name: area/quarkiverse
labels.description: This issue/PR is part of the Quarkiverse organization

body:
### Description

We would like to propose to build a new Quarkiverse extension to enable Zenoh support for Quarkus. We probably would like to do something along the likes of the MQTT extension with SmallRye Reactive Messaging.

Relevant links:
- http://zenoh.io/
- https://quarkus.io/extensions/io.quarkus/quarkus-messaging-mqtt/
- https://smallrye.io/smallrye-reactive-messaging/smallrye-reactive-messaging/3.4/mqtt/mqtt.html
- https://github.com/eclipse-zenoh/zenoh-kotlin

Interested in this extension, please +1 via the emoji/reaction feature of GitHub (top right).

### Repository name

quarkus-zenoh

### Short description

Quarkus Zenoh pub-sub support

### Repository Homepage URL

https://quarkiverse.github.io/quarkiverse-docs/quarkus-zenoh/dev/

### Repository Topics

- quarkus-extension
- zenoh
- messaging


### Team Members

- wjglerum
- vanny96


### Additional context

_No response_
